name: Magic Farm
description:
Till the land, plant seeds, and water them! When crops are harvested they come to life, and you must catch them with your net. Crops will attract monsters, be sure you check your farm every morning, and fight them off with your sword.

In the inventory menu you can swap items by clicking on one item, then clicking on another. Seeds can be moved into the tool section to be used and planted.

Keyboard controls:
[Arrow Keys] - Move
[Z] - Interact, Click buttons
[X] - Use tool, Close menu
[C] - Open menu
[S] - Hold to quick-switch tools, Use in menu to read item description

Gamepad controls:
[D-pad] - Move
[A] - Interact, Click buttons
[B] - Use tool, Close menu
[Y] - Open menu
[X] - Hold to quick-switch tools, Use in menu to read item description

Music:
Not Drunk by The Joy Drops, CC BY 4.0

This game was made with a Godot 3.1 unstable build, so the source code will need to be on Godot 3.1 or better, and may be broken with later builds of Godot 3.1.
